tiles.title: My Operator
tiles.content: View or update information of your operator here.

tiles.title: Operations
tiles.content: View the operations owned by your operator, or to add a new operation to your operator here.

tiles.title: Contacts
tiles.content: View the contacts of your operator, or to add new contact for your operator here.

tiles.title: User and Access Requests
tiles.content: View, approve or decline Business BCeid user access requests to your operator, or to assign type to user here.

tiles.title: Register an Operator
tiles.content: Track the registration of operations, or to start new registration here.

tiles.title: Report an Event
tiles.content: Report sales, transer, closure, acquisition, divestement, change in operator or director control, temporary shout down, etc. here.
